{{Actor| | type = Gibs | name = Green chaos serpent small meat chunk | class = Demon1Chunk3 | game = Hexen }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:DemonChunk|DemonChunk]]→Demon1Chunk3
One of the five chunks of meat thrown around when a [[Classes:Demon1|green chaos serpent]] is gibbed. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR Demon1Chunk3 : [[Classes:DemonChunk|DemonChunk]] { States { Spawn: DEMC A 4 DEMC A 10 [[A_QueueCorpse]] DEMC A 20 Wait Death: DEMC A -1 Stop } }
